puzzle.prompt: Someone has stolen military equipment!  Figure out who they are, what they stole, and where they hid it.

disks.text: Our small <color=#ff7777>island</color> nation is looking to accquire <color=#ff7777>nukes</color> from the <color=#ff7777>US</color>.  Do you know who would have info on this?  There will be plenty of money in it for you.

Friend <color=#ff7777>Cuba</color>.  We have determined your payment is sufficient.  You can use our <color=#ff7777>volcano</color> to store the items.  We will not inform <color=#ff7777>Russia</color>.
Meet us at the <color=#ff7777>Port</color> at <color=#ff7777>10 PM</color>.  We have a great <color=#ff7777>deal</color> to discuss.
